project.description: PHP Without mcrypt and intl extensions (CLI and CGI SAPIs only)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
# Install dependencies export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH echo $PATH sudo zypper install -y autoconf automake flex bison bzip2 cyrus-sasl-devel freetype2-devel \ gcc gcc-c++ gdbm-devel git gmp-devel libdb-4_8-devel libcurl-devel \ libjpeg62-devel libmysqlclient-devel libopenssl-devel libpng16-compat-devel \ libpng16-devel libpq5 libtool libxml2-devel libXpm-devel libxslt-devel \ make net-snmp-devel openldap2-devel pcre-devel pkg-config postgresql94-devel \ readline-devel unixODBC-devel vim wget # Get the source code cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/php/php-src.git cd php-src git checkout tags/php-7.1.2
# Symlink LDAP libraries and GMP header sudo ln -sf /usr/lib64/libldap.so /usr/lib/libldap.so sudo ln -sf /usr/lib64/liblber.so /usr/lib/liblber.so
#Build PHP
#a. Without mcrypt and intl extensions: #CLI and CGI SAPIs only cd $WORK_DIR/php-src ./buildconf --force ./configure --datadir=/usr/local/share/php --localstatedir=/var --mandir=/usr/local/share/man --prefix=/usr/local --sysconfdir=/usr/local/etc --enable-bcmath --enable-calendar --enable-ctype --with-curl --enable-dba=shared --enable-exif --enable-filter --enable-flatfile --enable-fpm --enable-ftp --enable-gd-native-ttf --enable-inifile --enable-mbstring --enable-mysqlnd --enable-opcache --enable-pcntl --enable-shmop --enable-simplexml --enable-sockets --enable-sysvsem --enable-sysvshm --enable-sysvmsg --enable-xmlreader --enable-xmlwriter --enable-zend-signals --enable-zip --disable-phpdbg --disable-phpdbg-webhelper --with-bz2 --with-config-file-path=/usr/local/etc --with-config-file-scan-dir=/usr/local/etc/conf.d --with-freetype-dir --with-gd --with-gdbm --with-gettext --with-gmp --with-iconv --with-jpeg-dir --with-kerberos --with-ldap --with-ldap-sasl --with-mysql-sock=/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock --with-mysqli=mysqlnd --with-openssl --with-pcre-regex --with-pdo-mysql=mysqlnd --with-pdo-odbc=unixODBC,/usr --with-pdo-pgsql --with-pdo-sqlite --with-pgsql --with-png-dir --with-readline --with-snmp --with-sqlite3 --with-unixODBC=/usr --with-xpm-dir=/usr --with-xsl --with-zlib --without-pcre-jit make clean make -j$(cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep processor | wc -l)
make test #(**NOTE:There are few test case failures which are also observed on Intel x86 platform. These failures can be ignored.)
sudo make install sudo install -m644 php.ini-production /usr/local/etc/php.ini sudo sed -i 's@php/includes"@&\ninclude_path = ".:/usr/local/lib/php"@' /usr/local/etc/php.ini php -v
#Configure PHP # PHP-FPM #Modify the file /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default to set php-fpm pid sudo cp /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default.orig sudo sed -i '17d' /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default sudo sed -i "17i pid = run/php-fpm.pid" /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default
sudo mv /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf sudo mv /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
#Modify the file /<source_root>/php-src/sapi/fpm/php-fpm.service.in to set php-fpm service environment variables cd $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/ sudo cp php-fpm.service.in php-fpm.service.in.orig sudo sed -i '10d' php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i "10i Type=simple" php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i '11d' php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i "11i PIDFile=/var/run/php-fpm.pid" php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i '12d' php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i "12i ExecStart=/usr/local/sbin/php-fpm --nodaemonize --fpm-config /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf" php-fpm.service.in
cd $WORK_DIR/php-src sudo cp $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/php-fpm.service.in /usr/lib/systemd/system/php-fpm.service sudo systemctl enable php-fpm.service #sudo systemctl daemon-reload (**NOTE-This command worked on host not in container) #sudo systemctl start php-fpm.service (**NOTE-This command worked on host not in container) #Zend OPcache #Modify the file /usr/local/etc/php.ini to enable Zend OPcache: sudo cp /usr/local/etc/php.ini /usr/local/etc/php.ini.orig sudo sed -i "1784i zend_extension=opcache.so" /usr/local/etc/php.ini
php -v
if php -v | grep "Zend OPcache v7.1.2"; then echo "Done" exit 0 else exit 1 fi
